snippet.title: Zoria: Age of Shattering - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Zoria: Age of Shattering went live on Kickstarter - support us today!
▷▷▷ https://bit.ly/ZoriaKickstarter

Play #Zoria ► https://bit.ly/Zoria_Steam
🎮 Check out all Anshar Publishing games ► https://bit.ly/Anshar_Games

Zoria: Age of Shattering is a squad-based tactical RPG with fluid turn-based combat, crafting, and outpost management. Lead a team of four heroes with their unique skills and perks. Every team member contributes to battles undertaken in the fantasy world of Zoria. The expansive land is filled with magic, ancient history, tumultuous politics, and countless mysteries waiting to be solved by your party.


Add Zoria: Age of Shattering to your Steam Wishlist and play the demo now: ►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159090/Zoria_Age_of_Shattering/
---
DISCORD
► https://discord.gg/k3fPxX8

WEBSITE
► https://zoriagame.com/

TWITTER
► https://twitter.com/ZoriaGame

FACEBOOK
► https://www.facebook.com/ZoriaAgeOfShattering

#zoria #rpg #tacticalrpg #rpggames #fantasy 

---

Video Editing: Radikal Studios
